movies.title: Ninotchka
movies.synopsis: A stern Russian woman sent to Paris to supervise the sale of jewels finds herself attracted to a man who represents everything she is supposed to detest.

movies.title: A Pigeon Sat on a Branch Reflecting on Existence
movies.synopsis: A series of absurdist vignettes exploring the human condition through surreal and darkly humorous scenarios.

movies.title: Barbara
movies.synopsis: A doctor in 1980s East Germany is banished to a small country hospital after applying for an exit visa.

movies.title: To Be or Not to Be
movies.synopsis: A Polish actor and his wife help a Polish pilot escape from the Nazis during World War II.

movies.title: The Lives of Others
movies.synopsis: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

movies.title: Milk
movies.synopsis: The story of Harvey Milk, California's first openly gay elected official.

movies.title: Nazareno Cruz y el Lobo
movies.synopsis: A young man cursed to become a werewolf every full moon falls in love with a beautiful woman.

movies.title: Inherit the Wind
movies.synopsis: Based on the famous Scopes Monkey Trial, a teacher is arrested for teaching evolution in a small Tennessee town.

movies.title: The Wind That Shakes the Barley
movies.synopsis: Two brothers fight for Irish independence in the 1920s, but find themselves on opposite sides of the civil war.

movies.title: Esperando la Carroza
movies.synopsis: A dysfunctional family tries to deal with their elderly mother who they believe is dead.

movies.title: Paddington
movies.synopsis: A young Peruvian bear travels to London in search of a home, finding himself taken in by the Brown family.

movies.title: Phantom Thread
movies.synopsis: A renowned dressmaker in 1950s London finds his carefully controlled life disrupted by a young, strong-willed woman.

movies.title: Legally Blonde
movies.synopsis: Elle Woods, a fashionable sorority queen, is dumped by her boyfriend and decides to follow him to law school.

movies.title: Flow
movies.synopsis: A cat separated from its family embarks on a journey through a surreal, post-apocalyptic world.

movies.title: The Devil Wears Prada
movies.synopsis: A young woman lands a job as an assistant to a powerful fashion magazine editor.

movies.title: Fantastic Planet
movies.synopsis: On a distant planet, giant blue aliens keep humans as pets, but one human's knowledge threatens their society.

movies.title: It's Such a Beautiful Day
movies.synopsis: A stick figure named Bill struggles with mental illness and the meaning of life in this animated trilogy.

movies.title: Nostalgia for the Light
movies.synopsis: In Chile's Atacama Desert, astronomers search for distant galaxies while women search for the remains of their loved ones.

movies.title: Another Round
movies.synopsis: Four high school teachers consume alcohol on a daily basis to see how it affects their social and professional lives.

movies.title: After Life
movies.synopsis: In a waystation between heaven and earth, the recently deceased must choose one memory to keep for eternity.

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.synopsis: A legendary concierge and his young protégé become involved in a conspiracy surrounding a priceless painting.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.synopsis: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy family and infiltrates their household.

movies.title: La La Land
movies.synopsis: An aspiring actress and a jazz musician fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles.

movies.title: Get Out
movies.synopsis: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's family estate, where he becomes ensnared in a sinister plot.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search of her homeland.

movies.title: The Shape of Water
movies.synopsis: At a top secret research facility in the 1960s, a lonely janitor forms a unique relationship with an amphibious creature.

movies.title: Call Me by Your Name
movies.synopsis: In 1980s Italy, a romance blossoms between a seventeen-year-old student and the older man hired as his father's research assistant.

movies.title: The Favourite
movies.synopsis: In early 18th century England, a frail Queen Anne occupies the throne and her close friend Lady Sarah governs the country.

movies.title: Hereditary
movies.synopsis: A grieving family is haunted by tragic and disturbing occurrences.

movies.title: Moonlight
movies.synopsis: A young African-American man grapples with his identity and sexuality while experiencing the everyday struggles of childhood, adolescence, and burgeoning adulthood.
